about_the_game:
Double Trouble is a dating simulator where every choice you make matters! You will have to become Scott, the manager of a small branch of a large company in a small town. Can you handle the hurricane of emotions, office intrigue and maybe even find love?

Scott is sent to a small town to get the branch office business up and running. He encounters two employees, Rebecca and Julia, who can't find common ground. Conflicts, passions, office dramas - all set against the backdrop of the need to keep the business afloat. Scott must learn to manage not only the business, but also his feelings. Because nothing relieves stress better than an office romance..... Exciting challenges and difficult decisions await you in Double Trouble

This game contains adult content, including scenes with romantic and sexual overtones.

Features
Interactive story: Every choice you make affects your relationship with the characters and the outcome of the story.
Diverse Characters: Meet coworkers Rebecca and Julia, each unique and harboring their own secrets.
Romance: Sparks fly through the air, but will it be love or just temporary passion?

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Double Trouble

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
